author: jmcnally
msg: added table to the test schema to cause the error described by
The problem is in the Table.getForeignKey(columnName) method.  This method
only gives the first fk the column is a part of.  In many cases this will
cause torque to miss additional functionality/relationships it could be adding.
In other cases it can give a fk that is not expected.  I have eliminated one
use in this category that was leading to torque objects with compile errors.
A complete fix requires a signature change to
In eliminating the use of the method in XmlToAppData, I went ahead and moved
the logic out of that class and into the model (Database to be exact) where
